bibl.title: Cloistered Bookworms in the Chicken-Coop of the Muses: The Ancient Library of Alexandria.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Founding. - How many books, and where did they come from? - The foreign books. - Arrangement and cataloguing. - The librarians. - When was the library destroyed? - Did the Arabs burn the books? - The vanished library. - Conclusion: Legend and legacy.
